title: Pore-edge graphitic nitride-dominant hierarchically porous carbons for boosting oxygen reduction catalysis
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00135D, Paper
Lilai Liu, Youzheng Wu, Hui Wang, Xueying Yang, Weirun Zhu, Shuanshuan Ma, Xiangyu Lu, Yaqiang Li, Penghui Ren, Peixia Yang, Ruopeng Li
The construction of pore structures at different scales (atomic defect and molecular porous structures) is the most promising method to achieve excellent ORR catalytic activity for carbon-based catalysts.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
